Anne was awarded the 2024 [Sloan Fellowship](https://sloan.org/fellowships/) in Neuroscience! She is one of 126 scientists receiving this award this year, and is one of three U-M faculty in this cohort. You can read about it [here](https://bme.umich.edu/2024/02/20/u-m-bmes-anne-draelos-named-a-2024-sloan-research-fellow-in-neuroscience/).
